doc.title: My Job II
doc.plot: Ingvild Soederlind has an interesting job. She is a speleologist, someone who explores caves. Ingvild became a speleologist because she really enjoyed exploring caves. She tells anyone can become it, but you need to train hard and remember a lot of things. Ingvild tells about the things you absolutely mustn't forget, or else it will the be end. Luckily, there are some fun parts to the job too. Ingvild tells about her favorite hobby, high speed caving without any lights. Very dangerous, but fun.
